title: 166: The ORIGINAL Bachelor & Bachelorette Recap
itunes:title: 166: The ORIGINAL Bachelor & Bachelorette Recap
description:
The Broads recap "The Bachelor: Greatest Of All Time - First Bachelor/ette Seasons” and they are shocked at how much fun this episode is! First they chat first Bachelor ever, the “missing” Alex Michel, and all the fashion and WILD choices production made during this first ever season #findalexmichel. They then fall in love all over again with Trista Sutter, ABC’s first Bachelorette, discuss and her “journey” choosing dreamy Ryan. Lastly, they (of course) chat about Cassie and Colton’s current insta drama. Join The Broads as they laugh and reminisce about crying and reveal Bachelor conspiracy’s and much more in this episode! 
FOLLOW US:
Chatty Broads - @chattybroads 
Bekah - @bekah
Jess - @thebaddmom

 today or head to peanut.app.link/broads
